data.system_settings: Android 6.0.1 on a Samsung Galaxy S5
data.actual_result: The channel SPEEDS like a racer to the top of he screen
data.expected_result: The channel moves as smoothly as roles and guilds do.
data.short_description: Sorting channels constantly scrolls up (or is too sensitive)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into server settings of a guild you have permission to move channels in - Set your mode to text channels - Try moving a channel up one channel.
